title: FEATURE JOBS: Sarah Humphries Agency, WOTSO, Michaels Camera Video & Digital + More
text:
Sarah Humphries Agency are currently recruiting for a Publicist (SYD). This is the perfect role for a dynamic thinker, who ultimately wants to be leading their own accounts and team in the long-run. Find out more.

WOTSO seek a Retail Manager (SYD) with previous experience in sales and customer service, especially in the retail or hospitality environments. At WOTSO, they champion continued development and like people who love a challenge. Check it out.

Michaels Camera Video & Digital are hiring for a Camera Rental & Repair Consultant (MEL). Your role will be to supervise the team, ensuring their clients receive the quality of service they have become renowned for, as well as maintaining daily operational schedules and operational efficiency. Apply now.

Meshki are on the hunt for an Ecommerce Manager (SYD) to be responsible for all e-commerce activities, proactively driving onsite sales and opportunities for the brand. You will oversee the day-to-day management of the customer experience and website performance by driving onsite conversion. Get on it.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

Fashion Agent are looking for a Sales Assistant (SYD) to assist during a Fashion trade show in Sydney on September 15th to 17th. Find out more.

Sol Cleanse are recruiting for a Marketing Strategist & Coordinator (Gold Coast) who is passionate about holistic health and sincerely enjoys reaching out to people with the goal of improving lives. Apply now.

Taco Technologies seek a Content Marketer & Copywriter (SYD) to implement strategy and create content useful to their reseller and partner network. Check it out.

Don’t let your dream job slip you by – Love your work! Find out more about our ethical jobs & non-for-profit jobs, jobs in WA and our jobs in Sydney, Perth, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide, Gold Coast and more.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and get yourself signed up to our Daily Job Alerts.

For employers looking to Post a Job, click here.
